title: Blackout Travel Camo Inflatable Lounger Air Sofa Hammock-Portable,Water Proof& Anti-Air Leaking Design-Ideal Couch for Backyard Lakeside Beach Traveling Camping Picnics & Music Festivals
features: ✔ EASY INFLATION-No pump required. Just whisk it through the air to inflate. The little trick is that you need to trap air by closing the sleeve opening before the end of each movement, and keep the mouth closed until you begin the next movement.

✔ ANTI-DEFLATION TECHNOLOGY-Our unique patented design together with years of experience of making inflated products make sure that once the Blackout Travel air lounge is inflated, it will stay inflated for at least 5-6 hours for our customers to enjoy.
✔ NYLON SLING CARRY BAG– This beach lounge also comes with a carry bag to let you store and transport the air sofa conveniently.

✔ 100% RISK-FREE SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – We also offer you 100% risk-free satisfaction guarantee to let you buy with confidence; no questions asked. However, we are quite sure that you will be super impressed with the fact that this wind bed can be used even as swimming pool floats, proves indispensable for outdoor adventures & is hassle-free to use!
description: The Blackout Travel inflatable hammock is a hot new product that lets you hang out in total comfort, wherever you might find yourself! It also makes an awesome gift for anyone who loves to spend time in the Great Outdoors. We created this signature digital camo air couch to help you explore and relax in style whether you are camping, traveling or simply having fun on beach due to its portability(only 2.5 lbs), easy inflation and unique headrest pillow design. With the Blackout Travel Air Couch Sofa, you can enjoy the great outdoors anytime, anywhere; This inflatable couch is a folding chair, hammock, picnic blanket and a pool float all in one, while saving you the hassle. It won't leave you blue in the face from trying to blow it up. Simply unfold, scoop air into it and roll and buckle. If you are looking for a quick and easy set up for an enjoyable time, Blackout Travel air couch is the choice for you! Built for Any Adventure Thicker & Stronger Design With our thicker & stronger design, your air chair is ready for exploration! Stronger Plastic Inner Lining. Tough Ripstop Polyester Outer Layer. Capable of holding up to 500lbs. Beach Vacations Are you someone who longs for the beach when having a hard time at work, or having to spend time with demanding clients? Just take a Blackout Travel beach bed to go with you. With a cool breeze through your hair and a smile on your face, it feels like lounging on a cloud. Hanging Out with Friends. Blackout Travel designs this uniquely shaped air chair that lets you hang out with your friends in total comfort, wherever you might find yourself! It becomes a great blow up chair for outdoors when you are making happy memories with your buddies. Camping Trips Compact portability, ease of use and great comfort make Blackout Travel camp chair the perfect accessory for the camping. Blackout Travel Inflatable Lounger opens up a world of options and let you make better connection with our Mother Nature.
